category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 24 (Storage and Use of Hazardous Substances)
contents: Article 24 (Storage and Use of Hazardous Substances) ① The Chairman shall designate and manage a person in charge of handling hazardous substances at workplaces that handle hazardous substances in Annex 1 of the “Rules on Occupational Safety and Health Standards” (hereinafter referred to as *Safety and Health Rules). shall. Revised on December 22, 2021., ② The chairman of the board of directors must store hazardous substances in a separate designated place other than the workplace, and only the minimum amount necessary for work must be placed inside the workplace., ③ The chairman of the board of directors must not carry or carry explosive substances in a place where hazardous substances are handled. Entry other than those involved must be prohibited. In this case, a sign prohibiting entry must be posted at the place where hazardous substances are handled and the dangers of the substance must be posted to inform people that it is a dangerous place.
